mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_goods_detail(goods_detail_nm, goods_detail_price, goods_detail_amount, goods_detail_expression, goods_image_path, goods_post, goods_address, goods_detail_address, goods_detail_tel, goods_detail_view_yn, t_promotion_seq, t_company_seq, t_goods_type_seq) VALUES(#{goods_detail_nm}, #{goods_detail_price}, #{goods_detail_amount}, #{goods_detail_expression}, #{goods_image_path}, #{goods_post}, #{goods_address}, #{goods_detail_address}, #{goods_detail_tel}, 'N', #{t_promotion_seq}, #{t_company_seq}, #{t_goods_type_seq})
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.promotion_nm FROM t_goods_detail a, t_promotion b WHERE a.goods_detail_seq = #{goods_detail_seq} AND a.t_promotion_seq = b.promotion_seq
SELECT * FROM t_goods_detail a, t_goods_type b, t_company c WHERE a.t_goods_type_seq = b.type_seq AND a.t_company_seq = #{t_company_seq} AND a.t_company_seq = c.company_seq

SELECT * FROM t_goods_detail a, t_goods_type b, t_company c WHERE a.t_goods_type_seq = b.type_seq AND a.t_company_seq = #{t_company_seq} AND a.t_company_seq = c.company_seq AND a.goods_detail_nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#{goods_detail_nm},'%')
SELECT * FROM t_goods_detail a, t_goods_type b WHERE a.t_goods_type_seq = b.type_seq ORDER BY a.goods_detail_seq

SELECT * FROM t_goods_detail a, t_goods_type b, t_company c WHERE a.t_goods_type_seq = b.type_seq AND a.t_company_seq = c.company_seq AND c.company_nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#{company_nm},'%') AND a.goods_detail_nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#{goods_detail_nm},'%')
SELECT * FROM t_goods_detail a, t_goods_type b, t_company c WHERE a.t_goods_type_seq = b.type_seq AND a.t_company_seq = c.company_seq AND a.goods_detail_nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#{goods_detail_nm},'%')
SELECT * FROM t_goods_detail a, t_goods_type b, t_company c WHERE a.t_goods_type_seq = b.type_seq AND a.t_company_seq = c.company_seq AND c.company_nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#{company_nm},'%')
mapper.update: UPDATE t_goods_detail SET goods_detail_view_yn = 'Y' WHERE goods_detail_seq = #{goods_detail_seq}
UPDATE t_goods_detail SET goods_detail_view_yn = 'Y' WHERE t_goods_seq = #{goods_seq} AND goods_detail_seq = #{goods_detail_seq}
UPDATE t_goods_detail SET goods_detail_view_yn = 'N' WHERE goods_detail_seq = #{goods_detail_seq}
UPDATE t_goods_detail SET goods_detail_view_yn = 'N' WHERE t_goods_seq = #{goods_seq} AND goods_detail_seq = #{goods_detail_seq}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_goods_detail WHERE goods_detail_seq = #{goods_detail_seq} AND t_goods_seq = #{goods_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_goods_detail where goods_detail_nm Like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') Limit #{limit},16
